amendment.description: An amendment numbered 74 printed in the Congressional Record to limit the plan to include the lease of any land for oil or gas production to a company that has purchased an equity security of the company listed on a national securities exchange.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to limit the plan to include the lease of any land for oil or gas production to a company that has purchased an equity security of the company listed on a national securities exchange.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 256 (Roll no. 67).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Ms. Ocasio-Cortez.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 256 (Roll no. 67).

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
